堧字的基本解释

堧
ruán
城下宫庙外及水边等处的空地或田地：“税城廓堧及园田。”
古代宫殿的外墙：堧垣。墙堧。

堧字的汉语字典释义

[①]［ruán］
［《集韻》而宣切，平，日。］
亦作“堧1”。
空地；边缘余地。

堧字的康熙字典解释

【丑集中】【土字部】　堧； 康熙笔画：12； 页码：页233第24
【廣韻】而緣切【集韻】【韻會】【正韻】而宣切。?同壖。韋昭曰：河邊地。張晏曰：城旁地。一曰城下田。　又廟外垣內游地。【前漢·申屠嘉傳】鼂錯穿太上皇廟堧垣。【師古曰】堧者，外垣之內，內垣之外。　又【廣韻】乃臥切【集韻】奴臥切，?音愞。沙土也。又【集韻】奴亂切，音餪。水濵地。亦作㽭?壖。互見壖字註。

堧
Basic explanation of words
堧
ruán
The vacant land or fields outside the palaces and temples under the city and at the water's edge: "Shuicheng 堧堧 and Yuantian."
The outer wall of the ancient palace: Hirigaki. Wall 堧.
堧

Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Ugly Collection] [The Ministry of Soil Characters] 　堧; Kangxi Strokes: 12; Page Number: Page 233-24
[Guang Yun] and cut the edge [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] [Zheng Yun] and Xuan Qi. ? The same. Wei Zhao said: Riverside. Zhang Yan said: Next to the city. One said the city under the field.　There is a place to swim inside the temple outside the wall. [Previous Han·Shentu Jia Biography] Miao went wrong through the wall of the Taishang imperial temple. [Shigu said] Those who are in the 堧 are inside the outer wall and outside the inner wall.　[Guangyun] is a lying-cutting [Jiyun] Slave-cutting,? Yinming. Sand also. Also [Jiyun] Slave cuts in disorder, the sound is delicious. Water rush to the land. Also known as 㽭? 壖. See each other's word note.
